title: Sunset Over the Mountains
description: A breathtaking view of the sun setting behind a mountain range, casting golden hues over the sky and clouds.

title: Green Meadow and Blue Sky
description: A peaceful scene of a lush green meadow stretching towards a clear blue sky, representing serenity and open space.

title: Sunset Reflection on a Lake
description: The calm waters of a lake reflecting the vibrant colors of a stunning sunset, surrounded by trees and mountains.

title: Forest Road on a Summer Morning
description: A winding road cutting through a dense forest in the early hours of a summer day, with light filtering through the trees.

title: Mountain Landscape with Clear Blue Sky
description: A vast mountain range under a cloudless blue sky, showcasing nature's grandeur and the beauty of untouched wilderness.
